_header: The pleasant leams of your eyen clear
_description: Charles d’Orléans, A criticism of his mistress — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
THe plesaunt lemys of yowre eyen clereMi hert it hath so persid in
                    euery vayne…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…With yow so right as ben othir nowLo thus complayntoure
                    causeles am not y
